name: Climbing Marble
description:
Ctrl - if the screen is too big.

Controls

> AD - Move 

> S - Jump/Fastfall

> Space Bar - Pause Game

> 1-6 - Change skin/effects


Note: Multiplayer is very buggy, and it usually doesn't work on the first try. If its loading for too long, the player is invisible, or anything like that, resfresh the page, try again, and hope it works. 

If there are problems with the game, like not loading, try refreshing the page a couple of time. You can also try using another browser, but progress data doesn't save between different browsers.
